scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "cd UserService/client && npm run start" "cd UserService/server && npm run start" "cd ta-corrd-service && npm start" "cd ApplicantService && npm start"
scripts.install_all: concurrently "cd UserService/client && npm install" "cd UserService/server && npm install" "cd ta-corrd-service && npm install" "cd ApplicantService && npm install"
